column4: i noticed umbrella and maluf are back :P
and doing much the same thing!
i hate being a perfectionist :P i like my cities in perfect blocks
i've been guilty of demolishing roads that were out of place
yes, and i would delete the street along 40
i wouldnt - makes a perfect block
maluf will not be with us for long again...
still has over $1 million net wealth though
he has more traffic this time, but again infrastructure not efficient
maluf - net wealth $1.17 million - so another 10 years roughly
i noticed he built huge bridges - long term monthly costs
ah, i was looking at bank balance
i can see why u stick to freight - managing PAX is a pain
ah, GAC connected the public road network & city cars got in :(
ok i wasnt sure if i was to supply steel or not
Maluf currently supplies steel there- believe it or not
i joined this map planning to do pax but pax was developed and freight wasn't
ive given up on freight atm - trying to focus on my PAM Network
looking at our margins it seems pax delivers a better margin
though with my hub and spoke setup i sacrifice some profit in exchange for easier management
true - i dont operate via hubs :P i just go direct and have busy freight lines :P
Umbrella or IF - whos still there?
i'm still here, lots of desyncs though
yeah i was trying to see how umbrella could save money- ive already worked 500 off the montly total
so many depots not needed, etc
if umbrella has excess electronic production i can take it from london mall if he delivers to the public stop there
or i should say if he can support higher production
i have connection from london mall to westminster mall 277,59
but he's on a risky strategy since i am also producing and supplying to most of his malls
yeah i saw the public stop and was surprised he wasnt using it - esp to save monthly cost
he may not have noticed it, the colour isn't bright
doesnt help when his train cant find its way :P
not if you're trying to succeed, anyway
I did not connect anything, this is the result of city's growth
Timothy said that the server will be surely reseted this week-end...
oh sorry, i didn't see your first message, only your 2nd
i didn't see about the server reset
Yes and I'm a little bored of this savegame too
i was guessing, por que? = why? in spanish
I don't speak spanish at all sorry ;)
i know, that's why i was guessing at it
i was hoping the french was like the spanish, but i was wrong
Will continue to play once the server will reset ? Me yes :)
i released it, it escaped, now i don't know where it is
just that moment of shock when it wasn't where it was supposed to go
so will you have a final flourish before the weekend?
before the map is consigned to history?
There are too much things on the map
I can't anymore developping my network as I want
for the server to handle, you mean?
or you mean too much infrastructure?
too much industries, routes and railway's lines,...
hmm, there are still large areas undeveloped
And sephiroth is not doing for the best ;)
Yes but he'll be soon in  a new company... and again, again...
And when he will not be in bankrupt...
well, either he will keep doing the same thing or he will try in a different place
His infrastructures are... I don't know how to translate it in english
give me the french, maybe we use the same word
wherever he goes you can develop somewhere else
That's why suggested Timothy to make a bigger map than this one, this one is too small for a such number of players :)
so long as it can work over the internet that's good
can you delete road 303,91? i want to put a bridge across
31,216 you should add a roadsign for motorway
i just replaced that motorway, city road had been put there
thanks though, as i would have forgotten that
i am not as good a highway engineer as you ;)
You learned as you said, and now you're as good as me :)
i wasn't expanding, i was just upgrading some trucks that were slowing traffic on the motorway
no, not as good as you
i think online play will make all of us better players
I also learned from you for freight transport ;)
the only thing that seems to effective in blocking city growth is farm growth :)
In the next map I'll do freight transport too :)
i was amazed by your passenger network when i joined
I made by far better in the past some amazing network in my savegames :)
i'm not surprised, you seemed to do this one so easily
i had planned to do pax here but when i saw developed pax and undeveloped freight i changed plan
it would be interesting to try different ways of dividing between players on a map
e.g. each player takes on particular industry chains
or each player takes a portion of the map and does everything within that
and hands over to neighbours at public stops
I was also thinking about that
we can try that in the future map
that is an obvious thing to do with pax
only one player in each city
but one industry chain for a player...
with freight it could be very interesting
one chain per player has the problem that everyone has to cover the whole map
or maybe public stop for freight too
we can't share rails, can we?
to share the railway network too
sharing rails could fix the spaghetti problem
build a rail network and then everyone uses it
but how to make it efficient ?
with a geographical division we could try like this...
define interfaces between players, locations to have public yards wherre goods are handed over
well, we know the maximum players plssible
But new players may not want to do as it ;)
to begin with we could experiment
and not take the whole map when starting
if it's fun to do then the next step is to define some games like that
i.e. if you want to play on server x then you must play that way
Yes but we dot not own this server...
that is for the future, there are possibilities
Timothy may be interested in hosting such games
i may also look into hosting myself
Well for me it's too much complicated :)
But if I understand well, you'll have to pay for hosting a good server
well i could get a used pc and run it from home but i don't know if the upload speed is enough
I read somewhere that 20Mb at least is necessary...
i have a pc here i can test with
looks like only 1Mb/s is available here
a slow upload speed could still work with few players
but our internet infrastructure here is a bit primitive, we have a major scheme underway to upgrade it all over the country
i need to learn how to compile simutrans myself
but it doesn't require a powerful computer, i could use an old one
But you better have to wait for this week-end :)
i may do a test sometime but it looks like the upload speed will not be adequate
You better have to do trucks
Another idea IF, why not making an old worl, a world in the 40s with steam trains... :D
Umbrella, you need to make longer trains to get a profit
Your railway around 70,77 is too small to gets any profits
You need to make here trucks
Trains are only for long distances
You need to start to find a line that gets fast profits
I must destroy that to train and truck, right?
You need now to have a new company with 3 millions ;)
You don't have a lot of money...
But you know this week-end Tomthy may reset the server
Don't know but he said it to you on the forum if you are sephiroth ;)
Maybe because the map is quite full
What ? Did I make a mistake? Did I offense you ? You know I don't speak very well english...
oh now im not- b4 i was :P
btw GAC i noticed a big jam of your buses
but ur buses were stuck there for almost 5 months
Thanks to IF's advice, I am finally back Alliance. Hello G&C!
Hello FT LLC - have u used any other names in the past?
wow that's a lot of trucks lol
What was the problem with your installatoin ?
GAC can i request an overpass upgrade?
I use GDI but according to moblet (IF) on the forum, i needed to use SDL...
I thought you would recognize me instantly...
LLC-the colours seemed right but it wasnt quite ur style 100%
GAC: 206,324 - upgrade to next bridge up - since LLC+I have fast trucks using it
i mean i haven't seen anyone else that i used to play with :P no v-trans,purple,etc
you know you can make a sign to speak without making stops Alliance ;)
Alliance, you can delete your tem bridge
i know but i get desync everytime i do lol!
im sure u noticed 204,323 and my signs at swansea- for that reason
yes, but I thought you did that because there was stops and my roads
in single player i use like 1000000 signs everywhere
damn cardiff airport gets bigger and bigger :P
sorry, offline doing route planning. name change... no reason.
ok LLC :P ill have to call u this from now on :P
LLC -dw - if i get dc- i go single player and practice my next couple of moves lol
@Alliance, you can have that powerplant, I am going to get rid of that line from the north.
@G&C, objections to serving power plant at 268, 451?
that's a good PP - not too many trucks - not too far from autobahn ;)
flag it in a sign near swansea so when he logs back in
yeah LLC - that's a tough jam
i have a temp fix though. Never put a dead end at the end of a main road.
city cars will always avoid a dead end, but not a continuation of a road.
so that little bit of gravel ought to fix things
LLC 373,386 - when did that happen? lol
feel free to use once complete
im trying to work out which coal mine ur aiming for :P
But after I started building, I saw that I could do that too.
oh u were building for fun lol
thought u were going to do an interchange there :P
although it's fun watching u build :)
LLC no objections you know, make as you want if at least it's integrated in the environment ;)
k thanks. I need to go for a little while, bye!
autobahn's jammed up again at this little circle yellow made
I have to go now, bye !
